info.title: Azure AgriculturePlatform Data Platform Service
info.description: APIs documentation for Azure AgPlatform DataPlane Service.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of Catalog resources.

patch.description: Creates or updates a Catalog resource.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

delete.description: Deletes Catalog for given Catalog id.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of Collection resources.

patch.description: Creates or updates a Collection resource.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

delete.description: Deletes Collection for given Collection id.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

patch.description: Creates or updates a Item resource.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

delete.description: Deletes Item for given Item id.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.description: Creates or updates a Item resource.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

post.description: Search for Items across all parties by intersecting geometry.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000,
Default Value = 50.

post.description: Search for Items across all collections.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000,
Default Value = 50.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 1, Maximum = 100, Default
value = 10.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Skip token for getting next set of results.

post.description:
Searches for STAC items by collection id, bbox, intersecting geometry, start
and end datetime.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 1, Maximum = 100, Default
value = 10.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Skip token for getting next set of results.

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

post.description: Gets Solution get job response async.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.description: Downloads and returns file Stream as response for the given input filePath.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of Schema resources.

patch.description: Creates or updates a Schema resource.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

delete.description: Deletes Schema for given Schema id.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

ApiKeyAuthCredentials.description: Api Key Auth Credentials class for API Key based Auth.

kind.description: Enum for different types of AuthCredentials supported.

AuthCredentialsKind.description: Enum for different types of AuthCredentials supported.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

eTag.description: The ETag value to implement optimistic concurrency.

createdDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was created, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

modifiedDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was last modified, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

properties.description:
A collection of key value pairs that belongs to the resource.
Each pair must not have a key greater than 50 characters
and must not have a value greater than 150 characters.
Note: A maximum of 25 key value pairs can be provided for a resource and only
string,
numeral and datetime (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ) values are supported.

Measures.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

coordinates.description:
Gets or sets Coordinates of GeoJSON Object.
It must be an array of polygons, each polygon contains list of linear rings.
For Polygons with more than one of these rings, the first MUST be the exterior
ring,
and any others MUST be interior rings.

value.description: The Catalog items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The Collection items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The Schema items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

coordinates.description:
Gets or sets the coordinate of this point.
It must be an array of 2 or 3 elements for a 2D or 3D system.

Gets or sets type of the GeoJSON Object.
It must be an array of linear ring coordinate arrays.
For Polygons with more than one of these rings, the first MUST be the exterior
ring,
and any others MUST be interior rings.

SamplePartnerAcceptedResponse.description: Represents a successful 202 response from the Solutions API.

SamplePartnerOkResponse.description: Represents a successful 200 response from the Solutions API.

imageFormats.description: List of ImageFormats. Available value: TIF.

imageResolutions.description: List of ImageResolutions in meters. Available values: 10, 20, 60.

provider.description: Provider of satellite data. Available Value: SentinelHub.

providerCollectionId.description: Collection of satellite data. Available Value: sentinel-2-l2a, sentinel-2-l1c.

provider.description: Provider of satellite data. Available Value: SentinelHub.

providerCollectionId.description: Collection of satellite data. Available Value: sentinel-2-l2a, sentinel-2-l1c.

startDateTime.description: Start datetime of the time interval in which to search for Items.

provider.description: Provider of satellite data. Available Value: SentinelHub.

endDateTime.description: End datetime of the time interval in which to search for Items.

intersects.description:
GeoJSON (For more details: https://geojson.org/). Note: Coordinates are
expected in [Longitude, Latitude] format.

bbox.description:
Only items that have a geometry that intersects the bounding box are selected.
The bounding box is provided as four numbers. The coordinate reference system
of the values is WGS84 longitude/latitude.

featureIds.description: Array of feature ids to return.

providerCollectionId.description: Collection of satellite data. Available Value: sentinel-2-l2a, sentinel-2-l1c.

SearchFeaturesResponse.description:
Paged response contains list of items and next property to get the next set of
results.

nextLink.description:
URL to do the POST request with same filters,
to get next set of items.

SolutionResource.description: Represents a resource solution in the Agriculture Platform Service.

StacItem.description:
Schema of STAC Item.
Refer for spec:
https://github.com/radiantearth/stac-spec/blob/v1.0.0-beta.2/item-spec/item-spec.md#item-fields.

stacVersion.description: The STAC version the Stac Item implements.

stacExtensions.description: A list of extensions the Stac Item implements.

id.description: Provider identifier. Globally unique ID by Data provider.

type.description: Type of the GeoJSON Object. It's value is always Feature.

geometry.description:
Defines the full footprint of the asset represented by this item.
Its a GeoJSON geometry.

properties.description: A dictionary of additional metadata for the item.

links.description: List of link objects to resources and related URLs.

assets.description: Dictionary of asset objects, each with a unique key.

providerCollectionId.description: The id of the STAC Collection this Stac Item references.

rel.description: The relation type of the link.

type.description: The type of the link. Optional.

title.description: The title of the link. Optional.

providerApiName.description: Provider's api name to which request is to be made.

language.description:
Language (IETF BCP 47 language tag) in which search results should be returned
by the data provider. Examples: 'en-US', 'es', 'es-MX', 'fr-FR'.

units.description:
Units for which request to data provider is to be sent. Supported values are
'e' for English units, 'm' for Metric units, 'h' for Hybrid units (UK) and 's'
for Metric SI units.

additionalAttributes.description:
A collection of key value pairs that belongs to the resource. Each pair must
not have a key greater than 50 characters and must not have a value greater
than 250 characters. Note: A maximum of 100 key value pairs can be provided for
a resource and only string and numeral values are supported.

wetBulbTemperature.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

cloudCover.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

dayOrNight.description:
This data field indicates whether it is daytime or nighttime based on the Local
Apparent Time of the location.

iconCode.description:
This number is the key to the weather icon lookup. The data field shows the
icon number that is matched to represent the observed weather conditions.

iconCodeExtend.description: Code representing full set sensible weather.

hasPrecipitation.description: Indicates whether there is precipitation or not.

pressureMeanSeaLevel.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

relativeHumidity.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

temperature.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

temperatureDewPoint.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

temperatureFeelsLike.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

temperatureHeatIndex.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

temperatureWindChill.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

uvDescription.description:
The UV Index Description which complements the UV Index value by providing an
associated level of risk of skin damage due to exposure (-2 = Not Available, -1
= No Report, 0 to 2 = Low, 3 to 5 = Moderate, 6 to 7 = High, 8 to 10 = Very
High, 11 to 16 = Extreme).

validTimeLocal.description: Time forecast is valid in local apparent time.

validTime.description: Time forecast is valid in Utc format.

visibility.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

windDirection.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

windGust.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

windSpeed.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

wxPhraseLong.description: Hourly sensible weather phrase containing longer description.

wxPhraseShort.description: Hourly sensible weather phrase containing short description.

WeatherDataErrors.description: Model for errors encountered for all failed locations.

locations.description: List of errors encountered for all failed locations.

value.description: Location Value eg. "10,-25" for LocationType Type "LatLong".

requestCompletionTime.description: Request Completion Time in Utc of the location.

lastRefreshedDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was last requested, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

providerApiName.description: Provider's api name to which request is to be made.

language.description:

units.description:

'e' for English units, 'm' for Metric units, 'h' for Hybrid units (UK) and 's'
for Metric SI units.

by the data provider. Examples: 'en-US', 'es', 'es-MX', 'fr-FR'.

units.description:

credentials.description: Api Key Auth Credentials class for API Key based Auth.

locations.description: List of locations for which weather data need to be fetched from the provider.

WeatherResponse.description: Schema of Weather Data Provider Response.

status.description: Indicates a Succeeded, Failed, or PartiallySucceeded response.

locations.description: List of weather data for all the weather locations.

errors.description: Model for errors encountered for all failed locations.
